title: Still Life with Fruit and Flowers
titles: Still Life with Fruits and Flowers
description: Stilleven met vruchten en bloemen. Op een wit tafelkleed enige vruchten op een porseleinen schotel en een bloemboeket in een porseleinen vaas. Verder schelpen, enige insecten, torren, mieren, vlinders, sprinkhanen, een rups en spinnen.

principalMakers.name: Balthasar van der Ast
principalMakers.labelDesc: mentioned on object Balthasar van der Ast (1594 - 19-dec-1657)

acquisition.creditLine: Purchased with the support of the Vereniging Rembrandt

iconClassDescription: still life of plants, flowers and fruit

documentation: 'Galerij stillevens', Oog 3 (2009) nr. 2, p. 26-37, afb. p. 28-29.
longTitle: Still Life with Fruit and Flowers, Balthasar van der Ast, 1621
subTitle: h 39.2cm × w 69.8cm
scLabelLine: Balthasar van der Ast (c. 1593–1657), oil on panel, 1620–1621

label.title: Still Life with Fruit and Flowers
label.makerLine: Balthasar van der Ast (c. 1593–1657), oil on panel, 1620–1621
label.description: Flowers, fruit, butterflies, spiders, grasshoppers, a hermit crab in its shell: this painting invites the viewer to marvel at God’s creation. When it was new, the painting must have made a more colourful impression than it does now. The grey tablecloth, for example, was once purplish-pink, but the layer of transparent red glaze that originally covered it has faded.
